name: Timberland Garrison Trail Low Shoes - Men's
description:
Retro styled kicks that do their part for our planet. Made using sustainably minded materials, the Garrison Low Trail shoes are footwear you can feel good about.Uppers are made from waterproof synthetic leather and ReBOTL™ fabric.Waterproof forefoot helps keep toes dry when you encounter unavoidable puddles.Liners made from ReBOTL recycled fabric that wicks moisture away from the foot.Supportive EVA midsole.Aggressive TimberGrip™ traction technology tread uses natural resins and fibers to help keep you anchored in place.Climbing rubber toe bumper and heel piece is super grippy and there should need to get your boulder on.To date Timberland has re-purposed more 445 metric tons of plastic waste in their products.

        Sustainability
